show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content: If you would like to think deeply about human biological evolution, and how it has prepared (and failed to prepare) us... <!--more--> for modern living, my guest Jonathon Rottenberg and I do our best to reach into this fascinating and all-important subject.  We start with the origins of depression and move on from there.
